alert.note: Alert for Northern La Porte (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 25 at 10:52AM EDT until August 27 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers will be heavily swamped by waves. Waves increase from 2 to 3 feet Saturday morning, to 3 to 5 feet by late Saturday afternoon. * WHERE...In Indiana, Northern La Porte county. In Michigan, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien counties. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Do not venture out on piers.
